home.title: Python Software Developer
home.description: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a passionate software developer with expertise in Python, backend development, and creating engaging user experiences. Explore my projects and skills to learn more about my work.
home.quote1: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
home.quote2: Every artist was first an amateur.

about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a dedicated Python Software Developer with a strong foundation in video game design and development. My journey in tech is driven by a passion for creating innovative and efficient solutions. With experience in developing microservices, APIs, and a keen interest in the intersection of gaming and software engineering, I strive to bring a unique perspective to every project.
about.description2: My academic background in Video Game Design and Development has equipped me with a creative problem-solving approach, which I apply to develop user-friendly and engaging software applications. I am always eager to learn new technologies and methodologies to enhance my skills and contribute to impactful projects.
about.description3: Outside of work, I enjoy exploring new trends in technology, playing video games, and contributing to open-source projects. I believe in continuous growth and collaboration, and I'm excited to connect with like-minded professionals and explore new opportunities.
